text: @realDonaldTrump I listened to a real president speak today, Joe Biden. You are incompetent, corrupt, and insensitive.  We have been cruppled by your lack of a national COVID-19 increased testing policy. You are stopping testing funding to at risk populations in seven states. Stop the cruelty!
